message: Let's start with a fair deal, but I'm open to negotiation.
Alice, your offer was quite low.  Let's be fair - I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Inflation is hurting us both, so it's in our best interest to settle this round.
Let's split the difference this time.  We both lost money due to inflation, and I'm willing to compromise to end this quickly.
